name: Prosper Insights & Analytics
desc: Proprietary dataset of US and China consumer survey data. US - 15 years of data, tracks 7,500 monthly respondents for 1,290 brands/296 tickers. China - 8 years of data, tracks 5,000 respondents across 285 brands/126 tickers. Has exclusive distribution through Consumer Edge Research.
top_tickers: ASNA CVS KSS KR JCP M SHLD SVU TGT TJX WMT
sectors: Autos, China, Consumer, Financial Services, Gaming, Healthcare, Insurance, Internet, Media, Real Estate, Restaurants & Food Delivery, Retail, Telecom, Travel
data_delivery: Raw, Platform Based, Research Reports, Custom Analysis
